sect2.title: Util-linux Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chgrp, chmod, cp, install, ln, mv, rm Gettext: msgfmt, xgettext Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp, cpp0 Glibc: rpcgen Grep: grep Make: make Sed: sed Sh-utils: uname, whoami Textutils: cat
